title: Why am i lagging every time i play zed?
body: I am playing zed for some time now,i have over 100 games with him and recently i noticed that every time i pick him my ping goes from normal 43 to 100-150 i mean it is still playable but really annoying,my internet connection is a little bit slower at night,my computer is decent,but with zed it lags at any time of the day,does anyone know why this is happening/how can i fix it?i would really appreciate it :)

replies.body:
To be perfectly honest, I have never heard of a champion inducing lag before.  There have been reports of FPS drops, but champions usually do not interact with your internet connection to the game server.  Given that this is fairly bizarre, make sure that you complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).  The steps there should allow us to rule out some of the more common root causes, and let us investigate this issue deeper.

Give me a heads up if you are still seeing issues!

I am not lagging anymore but my ms is still higher than usual,it doesn't matter since i don't lag anymore,on normal games i have 43,when i play zed it's like 60-70 so it doesn't really matter,thank you anyway :)
